cloud-games/server-error: It seems like the Scratch server is having a problem.
cloud-games/no-projects: There are no projects to display.
cloud-games/change-display: You can select which projects or studios to display here in the {settings}.
cloud-games/change-display-open: You can also click "{buttonName}" below to add from the current tab.
cloud-games/change-display-2: You can also open a project or a studio and click "Add this project" or "Add this studio" button in this popup.
cloud-games/add-project-desc: Click to add the project from the current tab to the list.
cloud-games/add-studio-desc: Click to add the studio from the current tab to the list.
cloud-games/fetch-error: Could not load cloud data for this project:
